smell_panda: The **Panda** smells of bamboo and needs to shower.
smell_pyrowmid: The **Pyrowmid** smells familiar, but not too familiar.
smell_machine: The **Strange Machine** smells metallic, reminding you of the scent of a **Token**.
smell_token: A **Token** smells like a normal coin. What did you expect?
smell_ladder: The **Ladder** smells brand new, even though it has been sitting out for a while.
smell_hole: The **Hole** smells like a strange combination of dirt and electricity.
smell_lab: The **Abandoned Lab** smells strongly of machines and dust.
smell_terminal: Both the **Terminal** and the **Database** still smell strongly of the gas that they released once you collectively deposited 100 tokens.
smell_table: As you go to take a sniff of the **Table**, you end up with a noseful of dust.
smell_poster: The **Cat Poster** smells like lots of different things at the same time.
smell_mousehole: The **Mouse Hole** smells like screen cleaner and screwdrivers.
smell_box: Oddly enough, the **Peculiar Box** smells of nothing at all.
smell_shop: The **Quaint Shop** smells like healthy competition.
smell_clouds: The **Clouds** are a bit too high up for you to smell!
smell_wolf: The **Wolf** smells like a good boy.
smell_ghost: Even the **Ghost's** smell tells you it is internally screaming.
smell_photo: The **Photo** smells slightly of moss and spite.
smell_rustysword: The **Rusty Sword**, unsurprisingly, smells like rust.
smell_cafemixtape: The **Cafe Mixtape** smells like outdated audio formats.
smell_oversizedstythoscope: The **Oversized Stethoscope** smells like medical school.
smell_valentinesdaycard: The **Valentines Day Card** smells like glitter.
smell_hardcandy: The **Hard Candy** smells like a retirement home.
smell_deluxebirdseed: The **Deluxe Birdseed** smells like something a squirrel would enjoy.
smell_brokenmouse: The **Broken Mouse** smells like cheap plastic.
smell_fixedmouse: The **Fixed Mouse** smells like reinforced plastic.
smell_faithfulnecklace: The **Faithful Necklace** smells. You need to take it off and wash it.
smell_paddedstickersheet: The **Padded Sticker Sheet** smells like elementary school.
smell_duncecap: The **Dunce Cap** smells like <#944290668086448148>. That is, to say, bad.
smell_deviltail: The **Devil Tail** smells like fire and brimstone.
smell_lostnametag: The **Lost Name Tag** smells like the Department of Agriculture
smell_charcoalpencil: The **Charcoal Pencil** smells like a burnt-out campfire.
smell_fieldjournal: The **Field Journal** has a faint smell of slime emanating off of it.
smell_driftingmetronome: The **Drifting Metronome** smells slightly out of sync.
smell_filmreel: The **Film Reel** smells like *really* outdated video formats. Why are we still using these?
smell_swirlymarbles: You can almost swear the **Swirly Marbles** smell like celestial objects.
smell_caffeinatedsoda: The **Caffeinated Soda** tickles your nose as you try to smell it.
smell_beepingpager: The **Beeping Pager** gives a worrying scent. It makes you want to check up on people to make sure they are ok.
smell_breadcrumbs: The **Breadcrumbs** smell of slightly expired baked goods.
smell_fancyteaset: The **Fancy Tea Set** gives a scent of peppermint tea.
smell_secretadmirersnote: The **Secret Admirers Note** smells of teenage awkwardness.
smell_stickontabs: The **Stick-on Tabs** smell like those old sticker-sheets you got when you were three.
smell_tapiocapudding: The **Tapioca Pudding** smells like pudding. What did you expect?
smell_replacementvoid: The **Replacement Void** doesn't smell like anything. You get a bit worried.
smell_xraygoggles: The **X-Ray Goggles** smell like cheating at poker.
smell_scratchoffticket: The **Scratch-off Ticket** smells like the lottery.
smell_giftairstrike: The **Gift Air Strike** smells like santa.
smell_oldfiles: The **Old Files** smell like programmer art.
smell_spicymintgum: The **Spicy Mint Gum** smells like peppermint
smell_butterypopcorn: The **Buttery Popcorn** smell reminds you of movie nights.
smell_pocketdimension: The **Pocket Dimension** smells uncannily familiar, yet slighty different.
smell_quantummouse: The **Quantum Mouse** simultaneously smells like high-quality alloys and really cheap plastic.
smell_s1booster: The **Nostalgic Booster** smells like plastic packaging and blueberry lemonade.
smell_s2booster: The **Customized Booster** smells like plastic packaging and child pyramids.
smell_s3booster: The **Pixelated Booster** smells like plastic packaging and 32:41 ratios.
smell_s4booster: The **Released Booster** smells like plastic packaging and bamboo.
smell_s5booster: The **Alternative Booster** smells like plastic packaging and cat posters.
smell_s6booster: The **Diverse Booster** smells like plastic packaging and gender juice.
smell_s7booster: The **Animal Booster** smells like plastic packaging and wolf shop-owners.
spider_alert: Are you okay with smelling a spider?
smell_spider: The **Spider** smells like a small friend!
dont_have_item_1: Sorry, but you do not have the **
dont_have_cons_2: ** item can't be found in the shop or your inventory.
error_nopeeking_1: Sorry, but I either could not find the
error_nopeeking_2: card in the database, or you do not have it. Make sure that you spelled it right!
dont_have_card_1: Sorry, but you don't have the **
dont_have_card_2: ** card in your inventory or your storage.
no_card_1: Sorry, but I could not find the
no_card_2: card in the database. Make sure that you spelled it right!
no_arguments: Sorry, but the c!smell command expects 1 argument. Please see c!help for more details.
